edu.cmu.sphinx.api

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.api.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents common configuration options. This configuration is used by high-level recognition classes.
    See Also:
    SpeechAligner, LiveSpeechRecognizer, StreamSpeechRecognizer
